stuff.name: Álex Pina
stuff.description: Creator of La Casa de Papel, Álex Pina is a Spanish television producer, writer, series creator, and director, known for his gripping and intricate plots.

stuff.name: Jesús Colmenar
stuff.description: Director of many episodes of La Casa de Papel, Jesús Colmenar has also served as an executive producer, significantly shaping the show's success.

stuff.name: Esther Martínez Lobato
stuff.description: As an editor and co-creator alongside Álex Pina, Esther Martínez Lobato has played a crucial role in defining the narrative style of La Casa de Papel.

stuff.name: Manel Santisteban
stuff.description: Manel Santisteban, the theme music composer for La Casa de Papel, created the iconic opening song 'My Life Is Going On' that complements the show's intense and dramatic tone.

stuff.name: Vancouver Media
stuff.description: The production company behind La Casa de Papel, Vancouver Media, founded by Álex Pina, is renowned for its high-quality Spanish television series.
